name: nx-remotecache-custom
description: Build custom caching for @nrwl/nx in a few lines of code

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp README.md dist/README.md && cp CHANGELOG.md dist/CHANGELOG.md
scripts.release: npm run build && cd dist && npm publish && cd ..
scripts.local-release: npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --registry=http://localhost:4873/ && cd ..
scripts.link: npm run build && cd dist && npm link && cd ..

author: Niklas Portmann
